Guided meditation by Swami Omkarananda

Swami Omkarananda is a monk and disciple of the great Himalayan Master Pujya Sri Kalyan Das Babaji of Udasin tradition.

Beutiful natural setting with 38 acres of wooded land and all modern amenities. You will love the settings.
